name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience in leveraging **C#**, **Azure**, **Infrastructure as Code** tools including **Bicep** and **Terraform**, and container orchestration with **Kubernetes** and **Docker**. I excel in applying **Agile** and **SCRUM** methodologies to ensure efficient project delivery and collaboration. My technical expertise encompasses modern programming languages such as **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**, enabling me to contribute to full-stack development when necessary.
Throughout my career, I have designed and implemented robust backend solutions tailored for high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. I possess a deep understanding of cloud infrastructures and have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms with a strong emphasis on compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
My proficiency in DevOps practices allows me to streamline CI/CD pipelines, ensuring seamless integration and delivery. I am also experienced in building and deploying machine learning pipelines and utilizing tools like MLflow and Airflow to enhance operational efficiency.
